$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/ ! <> <> !! Usage # Tiddlers with tags `$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge` are recognized by the statistical chart plugin and put into the dashboard. ## This plugin comes with several such tiddlers, just fill in the tags to be tracked in the settings to use them. They will also remind you to fill them in the dashboard if you forget to do so. ## You can also disable these preset tiddlers in the settings. To disable, either put the `enabled: no` field on the tiddler, or click the `disable` button below the tiddler. # Clicking on the Add button ({{$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/ButtonOpenCreateGaugeModal}}) in the Calendar Dashboard layout opens a modal to quickly create a new visual dashboard. ## The gauges available in the modal are from the plugin's pre-built templates, and more gauge templates will be available as the plugin is updated. ## Each gauge created via the modal is a note tiddler in your wiki, and you can open the tiddler later to freely modify its content. ### Double-click the title to open the gauge tiddler in standard layout ### Through `{{ gauge tiddler title }}` transclusion syntax, you can embed gauge tiddlers in your other notes as gauges ### When used as gauges, you need to manually provide date variables. See "Available Variables in Dashboard" below. Outside the dashboard, these variables are not automatically provided, and you need to use `\procedure xxx() yyy` syntax to define procedures that provide these variables. !! Available Variables in Dashboard In gauge templates, you can use the following predefined variables: |!Variable Name |!Description |!Example Content | |`currentDateWeekOffset` |Current week offset (from dashboard's "Previous Week"/"Next Week" buttons) |`0` (current week), `-1` (last week), `2` (week after next) | |`currentDate` |Current date calculated based on offset in dashboard (needs manual provision when using gauges outside dashboard) |`20241201` | |`weekStartDate` |Start date of current week |`20241125` (Monday) | |`weekEndDate` |End date of current week |`20241201` (Sunday) | |`currentTag` |Tag for data statistics |`work`, `study`, `exercise` | These variables can be used in filter expressions, for example: * `[get[startDate]compare:date:gteq]` - Filter tiddlers with start date greater than or equal to the beginning of this week * `[in-tagtree-of:inclusive]` - Filter tiddlers containing the current tag !! Use as Widget !!! Setting Height Gauges default to 100% height of their container, but if container is not provided they will shrink to a small size. You need to provide a `div` container and set its height. ```tid
{{Weekly Statistics}}
``` !!! Manually Define Variables When Used Outside Dashboard When you want to embed gauge in other notes outside the dashboard, you need to manually provide the required "Available Variables in Dashboard". You can use `\procedure` syntax to define them: ```tid \procedure weekStartDate() 20241125 \procedure weekEndDate() 20241201 \procedure currentDate() 20241201 \procedure currentTag() work {{ Your gauge tiddler title }} ``` Or use filters from [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/date-filters]] to calculate dynamically: ``` \procedure weekStartDate() [weekstart[20241201]] \procedure weekEndDate() [weekend[20241201]] {{ Your gauge tiddler title }} ``` !! Developing new gauges ## Refer to the [[Calendar Plugin Official Wiki|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-calendar/]] for fields related to the Calendar Plugin. # See [[ECharts Plugin Official Wiki|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-echarts/]] for ECharts visualization-related Widgets. lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/ ! <> <> !! 用法 # 带有 `$:/Tags/VisualizationDashboard/Gauge` 标签的条目会被统计图表插件识别，放入仪表盘。 ## 本插件自带几个这样的条目，只需要在设置里填写要追踪的标签即可使用。如果忘了填写，它们也会在仪表盘里提醒你填写。 ## 你也可以在设置里禁用这些预置的条目。禁用即给条目带上 `enabled: no` 字段，或点击条目下方的「禁用」按钮。 # 点击「日历仪表盘」布局里的添加按钮（{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/tiddlywiki-ui/Modal/ButtonOpenCreateGaugeModal}}），可以打开对话框，快速创建新的可视化仪表。 ## 对话框里可选的仪表来自本插件预置的模板，随着本插件更新会有更多仪表模板可选。 ## 通过对话框创建的每个仪表，都是你知识库里的一个笔记条目，你可以随后打开条目自由修改其内容。 ### 双击标题可以在标准布局中打开仪表条目 ### 通过 `{{ 仪表条目标题 }}` 嵌入语法，可以在你的别的笔记中嵌入仪表条目，作为挂件展示 ### 作为挂件时，需要手动提供日期变量，详见下方的「仪表盘中可用变量」，在仪表盘外它们不会自动提供，你需要用 `\procedure xxx() yyy` 语法定义一个过程来提供这些变量。 !! 仪表盘中可用变量 在仪表模板中，你可以使用以下预定义变量： |!变量名 |!说明 |!示例内容 | |`currentDateWeekOffset` |当前周的偏移量（来自大屏的「上一周」「下一周」按钮） |`0`（当前周）、`-1`（上周）、`2`（下下周） | |`currentDate` |大屏中基于偏移量计算的当前日期（在大屏外使用挂件时，需要手动提供） |`20241201` | |`weekStartDate` |当前周的开始日期 |`20241125`（周一） | |`weekEndDate` |当前周的结束日期 |`20241201`（周日） | |`currentTag` |要统计数据的标签 |`工作`、`学习`、`运动` | 这些变量可以在筛选器表达式中使用，例如： * `[get[startDate]compare:date:gteq]` - 筛选开始日期大于等于本周开始的条目 * `[in-tagtree-of:inclusive]` - 筛选包含当前标签的条目 !! 作为挂件使用 !!! 设置高度 挂件默认是所在容器的 100% 高度，但如果没提供容器则会缩成一小团，你需要提供一个 `div` 容器，并设置其高度。 ```tid
{{本周情况统计}}
``` !!! 在仪表盘外使用时手动定义变量 当你想在仪表盘外的其他笔记中嵌入仪表挂件时，需要手动提供仪表所需的「仪表盘中可用变量」。你可以使用 `\procedure` 语法定义： ```tid \procedure weekStartDate() 20241125 \procedure weekEndDate() 20241201 \procedure currentDate() 20241201 \procedure currentTag() 工作 {{ 你的仪表条目标题 }} ``` 或者使用[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/date-filters]]中提供的筛选器动态计算： ``` \procedure weekStartDate() [weekstart[20241201]] \procedure weekEndDate() [weekend[20241201]] {{ 你的仪表条目标题 }} ``` !! 开发新仪表 # 参阅[[日历插件官方知识库|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-calendar/]]，了解日历插件相关的字段。 # 参阅[[ECharts 插件官方知识库|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-echarts/]]，了解 ECharts 可视化相关的微件。 "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"可视化大屏"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"在仪表盘上显示日历和知识库里事件的仪表和统计图表。提供基于 Echarts 的过程和图表生成器，以及显示统计图表仪表盘的布局。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/PluginConfigs":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/PluginConfigs","text":"插件设置"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/ConfigDescription":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/ConfigDescription","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「可视化大屏」插件的行为。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/Caption","text":"可视化大屏"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/Description","text":"可视化大屏集中展示统计日历事件和知识库活动的图表"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/Exit":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/Exit","text":"退出并返回默认布局"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/ExistingGaugesCount":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/VisualizationDashboardLayout/ExistingGaugesCount","text":"已有仪表数"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/PrevWeek":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/PrevWeek","text":"上一周"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Now":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Now","text":"现在"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/NextWeek":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/NextWeek","text":"下一周"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/visualization-dashboard/language/zh-Hans/Modal/CreateGaugeModal/Button/Open/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/l
